Articles.Content:
Winners of the best worst rocket awards 2000,2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011, and now

*Drum roll*

[glow=red,2,300]2012!!!!![/glow] I give you... THE WORST SHIPS EVER!!!They\'re actually quite good. HERE THEY ARE!!!

The Defender 189!!!

NOTE: NEEDS C7 FLIGHT PACK

THE PODRACER!

NOTE:NEEDS C7 FLIGHT PACK AND DOESN\'T LOOK THAT LIKE A PODRACER. With just two more tanks though, this

could get you to the mun!

More coming soon...

ANYTHING LISTED UNDER HERE COMING SOON

The Kerbject!

NOTE: NEEDS FLYING KERBANAUTS AND WOBBLY ROCKETS
Missiles mounted on top of a plane? That\'s kerbal!

Missiles mounted on top of a plane? That\'s kerbal!

I almost mounted mine right next to my tail fins before I realized they would explode from coming into contact with the tail fin.

Missiles mounted on top of a plane? That\'s kerbal!

Surprisingly enough this has happened before.

Surprisingly enough this has happened before.

Oh I\'m sure it\'s efficiently possible to do in the real world, but in KSP everything has the tendency to go downwards. ;D
The Missiles needed to be to balance it out. Without the plane would have just fallen over. I tried adding 4 adv sas but nope.
At 2:03, the ship in my video spins to release their missiles without them flying back into the craft. Also, they were attached to the tips of the wings.
My Shiva series planes all have a single wasp mounted on top as standard! What\'s so strange about that?
